question: Some people believe that it is a good idea to share as much information as possible in scientific research, business and the academic world. Others believe that some information is too important or too valuable to be shared freely.

To initiate, information keeps us updated about new inventions in the world.It is a right of a society member, who follows the rules and regulations and wants to serve the nation.Information sharing could give benefits to the society and further make people lives easier.
